caption:
Notice The Nurses: CLARA BARTON

Closing out our series this month is Clara Barton, whose nursing career started on the battlefields of the Civil War. 

She didn’t discriminate with her aid, providing care and supplies to soldiers from both sides, as well as reading to them and helping them write letters home. 

Wanting to do more after the war ended, she brought the Red Cross movement to America and served as its president for 23 years, bringing care across the nation and the world. 

#NoticeTheNurses #WomensHistoryMonth
